Suppose you win a prize from a scratch card. You can choose between two options to receive the prize: OPTION A: Receive an amount of money 1 week from today OR OPTION B: Receive a different amount 4 weeks from today.
Would you choose to receive (Option A) or to receive (Option B)? I will show you a list of options to pick from. Please touch the button for the option you prefer on the screen. (Interviewer reads out the options (receive X in 1 week v/s Y in 4 week) as the respondent is shown the screen. 


GAME INSTRUCTIONS: 
1) WHEN RESPONDENT SWITCHES FROM OPTION A TO OPTION B, ASK HIM ONE MORE QUESTION: - IF HE SAYS AGAIN OPTION B, GO TO Q3.2 
-IF HE SAYS OPTION A, MAKE SURE THE RESPONDENT HAS UNDERSTOOD THE GAME CORRECTLY. 
2) IF THE RESPONDENT CHOOSE ALWAYS OPTION A, GO TO Q3.2
